content: I completely agree with you on the importance of following up after the conference. I've been trying to make the most of my new role by attending networking events and conferences, and I've found that following up with new connections can lead to some really valuable opportunities. Speaking of which, I've been thinking about my own career goals and aspirations, and I'm considering pursuing an MBA or taking on additional certifications to enhance my skills and stay competitive in the industry. Do you have any advice on how to choose the right MBA program or certification for my career goals?
